name: King Arthur Gluten Free Fudge Brownie Mix: Rich, Chocolatey Dessert for Celiac and Non-GMO Diets - Certified Kosher Baking Mix, Easy to Prepare, 17 oz Box for Delicious Homemade Brownies
short_description: Gluten Free Brownies: Indulge in rich, fudgy brownies without gluten - perfect for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. This 17 oz gluten free brownie mix makes sixteen 2-inch squares of heavenly fudge brownies.

Easy Preparation: Simply add eggs, melted butter or oil, and water to create a delicious brownie batter. Follow the included instructions for either fudgy or cakey brownies, allowing you to customize your dessert experience.

Quality Certifications: Non-GMO Project Verified, Certified Gluten-Free by GFCO, and Certified Kosher. Instructions included for non-dairy preparation, ensuring a wide range of dietary needs are met with this versatile baking mix.

Pantry Essential: Keep this brownies mix on hand for quick and easy gluten free desserts. Perfect for satisfying chocolate cravings, entertaining guests, or creating special treats for any occasion. Enjoy the simple joy of baking with King Arthur.

Trusted Brand: King Arthur Baking Company, founded in 1790, is America's oldest flour company. As a 100% Employee-Owned business, we're committed to providing the highest quality baking products and inspiring recipes for our customers
product_description: Discover the rich, chocolatey goodness of King Arthur Gluten Free Fudge Brownie Mix. This 17 oz box creates delicious, homemade brownies catering to various dietary needs without compromising taste or texture. Certified Gluten-Free by GFCO, it's perfect for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. Preparation is simple - just add eggs, melted butter or oil, and water. Instructions for fudgy or cakey brownies are included, allowing customization. Each box makes sixteen 2-inch square brownies, ideal for sharing or savoring. King Arthur, a trusted name since 1790, offers this premium mix that's Non-GMO Project Verified and Certified Kosher. Instructions for non-dairy preparation are included, making it versatile for various dietary needs. As a 100% Employee-Owned Company and B Corporation, King Arthur is committed to quality and sustainability. This mix reflects their dedication to providing excellent baking products for all, regardless of dietary restrictions. The smooth texture and deep chocolate flavor will delight brownie lovers. It's a pantry essential, ready for quick desserts, special occasions, or satisfying cravings. Consistent, delectable results are guaranteed, making it a reliable choice for both experienced bakers and those new to gluten free baking. Store in a cool, dry place and use by the date on the package for best results. While King Arthur ensures quality, no specific warranty is offered for this mix. Experience the joy of baking gluten free with King Arthur Fudge Brownie Mix. Create cherished moments and satisfy chocolate cravings while adhering to dietary needs. Embrace gluten free baking with this easy-to-use, delicious mix from America's premier baking resource. Indulge in the simple pleasure of a perfect brownie with King Arthur Gluten Free Fudge Brownie Mix.

name: Lakanto Sugar Free Brownie Mix - Sweetened with Monk Fruit Sweetener, Keto Diet Friendly, Delicious Dutched Cocoa, High in Fiber, 3g Net Carbs, Gluten Free, Easy to Make Dessert (Pack of 3)
short_description: It's Brownie Time: We've made delicious brownies perfect for last minute birthdays, and late night snacking. Our brownies contain 3g net carbs and lots of fiber. They are also grain free, gluten free, sugar free, keto friendly, and always sweetened with a touch of monk fruit.

3 Simple Ingredients: To prepare your new favorite dessert, you'll need 1 package of our sugar free brownie mix, coconut oil, eggs, and water - that’s it! This low calorie, keto, vegetarian snack makes 16 servings of dutch chocolate brownies. It’s high in fiber with no gluten.

Lifestyle Friendly, Mom and Kid Approved: Your perfect snack has arrived. Lakanto makes the finest gluten free brownie mix around. This sugar free brownie mix works with ketogenic, low sugar, vegetarian, plant based, and all natural diets. You may need to buy 2 bags; 1 for yourself and 1 for the family.

300X Sweeter Than Sugar: Lakanto’s chocolate brownie mix is sweetened with monk fruit, a natural sweetener that tastes amazing without the negative effects of sugar. It also contains other healthy ingredients like rice flour, dutched cocoa, brown rice and more.

Lakanto's Mission Statement: At Lakanto, our mission is to Bring Chi to Life by inspiring people to reach their highest potential in health and wellness by creating products that are innovative, delicious, natural, and nutritious. Try some of our tasty products today!
